attributes.action: Support the proposal to implement a Unitary Council for Devon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The implimentation of the proposed Unitary Council for Devon as described in the options for Devon by the Boundaries Committee, which by describing the best possible set of circumstances and management structures, would ensure better and more economical goverment by the consent of the people. 
The retention of the existing District council structure which is both wastefull and un democratic is not able to acheive parity with those proposals.
